physiotherapist attends. They 
can instruct you in groups or 
individually. Feel free to ask 
them for advice and help.
Foot exercises
Foot exercises can be done 
sitting or standing. They 
improve blood circulation, 
reduce swelling in the ankles 
and prevent cramp in the calf 
muscles.
• Bend and stretch your foot 
vigorously up and down 30 
times.
• Rotate your foot eight 
times one way and eight 
times the other way.
• Repeat with the other foot.
To protect your back
